result.eng: We expected three but only one person came.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.orig: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.html: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duineWe expected three but only one person came.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor ṫáinig aċ duineWe expected three but only one person came.

result.ga: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an rí
result.orig: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an rí
result.html: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an ríThe king had three daughters.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí triúr iníonaċa ag an ríThe king had three daughters.

result.ga: Tá triúr clainne ag mo dheirfiúr
result.orig: Tá triúr clainne ag mo dheirfiúr
result.html: Tá triúr clainne ag mo dheirfiúrMy sister has three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr clainne ag mo ḋeirfiúrMy sister has three children.

result.html: Tá triúr gasúr agamI have three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr gasúr agamI have three children.

result.eng: I am sharing a house with three others.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eile
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eile
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eileI am sharing a house with three others.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eileI am sharing a house with three others.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.html: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic TheasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: She is married with three children.
result.ga: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.orig: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.html: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.

result.eng: There are three of you in the house, then.
result.ga: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.orig: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.html: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.
result.ponchtml: Triúr agaiḃ atá sa teaċ mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.

result.html: Tá triúr clainne agamI have three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr clainne agamI have three children.

result.eng: We have a son and three daughters.
result.ga: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againn
result.orig: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againn
result.html: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againnWe have a son and three daughters.
result.ponchtml: Tá mac agus triúr iníonaċa againnWe have a son and three daughters.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: There were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.orig: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.html: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
result.ga: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.orig: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.html: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachtaThree women were wading through the snow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneaċtaThree women were wading through the snow.
